trans-unit.source: Provides a client-side logical representation of the Windows Azure File service.
trans-unit.target: Provides a client-side logical representation of the Windows Azure File service.

trans-unit.source: This client is used to configure and execute requests against the File service.
trans-unit.target: This client is used to configure and execute requests against the File service.

trans-unit.source: The service client encapsulates the base URI for the File service.
trans-unit.target: The service client encapsulates the base URI for the File service.

trans-unit.source: If the service client will be used for authenticated access, it also encapsulates the credentials for accessing the storage account.
trans-unit.target: If the service client will be used for authenticated access, it also encapsulates the credentials for accessing the storage account.
